channel.title: Manipulating Element on UGENE Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Manipulating Element on UGENE Documentation

item.title: Adding Element
item.description:
Adding Element

There are several ways to add an element to the Scene.

The easiest way is to drag the required element from the Palette to the Scene. Alternatively, you can click on the element in the Palette and then click somewhere on the Scene.

You can also select an element in the Add item submenu of the Actions main menu or the Scene context menu. For example:

Once the required element is selected, click somewhere on the Scene to insert it.

item.title: Copying Element
item.description:
Copying Elements

To copy one or several workflow elements, select them on the Scene. Note that you can hold the Ctrl key to select multiple elements. Then choose the Copy option from the Actions main menu or from a selected element’s context menu.

The Ctrl+C hotkey is also available for this action.

Now you can paste these elements somewhere on the Scene.

item.title: Pasting Element
item.description:
Pasting Element

You can paste workflow elements that have been cut or copied.

To do this, choose the Paste item in the Actions main menu or in the Scene context menu.

Alternatively, use the Ctrl+V hotkey to paste the elements.

item.title: Cutting Element
item.description:
Cutting Element

To cut one or several workflow elements, select them on the Scene. Choose the Cut option in the Actions main menu or in the selected element’s context menu.

The Ctrl+X hotkey is also available for this action.

Now you can paste these elements.

item.title: Deleting Element
item.description:
Deleting Element

Select one or several workflow elements on the Scene that you want to delete. Then choose the Delete item in the Actions main menu or in the selected element’s context menu.

The hotkey for this action is Del.

item.title: Selecting All Elements on Scene
item.description:
Selecting All Elements on Scene

To select all workflow elements present on the Scene, choose Select all elements in the Actions main menu or in the Scene context menu.

Alternatively, use the Ctrl+A hotkey.
